title: Help!! Champ select blackscreen!

embed.description: Servimg is a free image hosting and upload service. Our image sharing service allows you to upload, host and share images and photos to forums and blogs.

body:
Hi! I'm here because i tried re-installing many times (10+, literally). And my champ selection screen is still just a blackscreen. 
I have tried to delete the lockfile created in the main folder when i start league, does nothing.
I have tried to press "enter", doesn't work either.
I tried the "repair button". Needless to say, still didn't work.
The link is what i literally see when i go in champ select or try to go in draft mode or custom or anything at all. Only things that work are store, the "home page", and  profile pages(masteries/runes/chests/item infos). 

What can i do now? I'm in a {{champion:104}}  need to play!

replies.body: Clueless how, but everything works now.
